form.response_time: We will respond within a few days.

about.text_1: Depending on the condition of the facility, we offer individually selected repair work volumes to the client, starting from ongoing maintenance and ending with railway overhaul or new railway construction.
about.text_2: Timely performed quality railway repair is a guarantee of railway transport safety and trouble-free operation.
about.title: What we do?

content.intro: Steel Buckle OÜ (formerly known as OÜ Renome) is a railway construction company providing railway construction, repair, and maintenance services.
content.history: The company was founded in 1993 based on a cooperative established four years earlier (1989). From the beginning, we have been engaged in the construction, repair, and maintenance of railways, including branch lines, crane tracks, and other railway infrastructure facilities.
content.materials: We also supply certified railway materials that meet the requirements of AS Eesti Raudtee.
content.staff: The company has continuously trained professional employees for years. Training is conducted by the best construction engineers and railway transport specialists. The presence of trained, experienced engineering and technical staff allows organizing work at a high level, ensuring high quality and traffic safety.
content.locations: Steel Buckle OÜ's production bases are located in Tallinn, Maardu and Paldiski, with the head office in Tallinn. Our project geography is quite extensive. The company has dozens of permanent clients in Estonia, and since 2007, we have been working steadily in the Latvian market. In Latvia, we carry out works in close cooperation with many local partners. Since 2014, we also have railway construction experience in Lithuania. New markets and interesting projects await us.
content.invitation: We invite you to become our client or partner!

benefits.title: Why choose us?
benefits.subtitle: Advantages of working with our company
benefits.intro: Our specialists take into account client wishes, specific features of the business operation, and regional characteristics.

items.title: Quality and professionalism
items.description: We have 35 years of successful experience in railway repair and construction.

items.title: Reasonable prices
items.description: The cost of work is calculated individually for each client. We create an efficient service package for railway construction and repair depending on the client's budget and capabilities.

items.title: Individual approach
items.description: All work is carried out according to the specifics of the company, terrain features, freight traffic intensity, etc.

items.title: Comprehensive assistance
items.description: Our specialists prepare a complete package of project and implementation documentation and ensure the commissioning of the railway. After completion of repair work, we are ready to take over the ongoing maintenance of the branch line.

items.title: Reliability
items.description: We offer at least a two-year warranty on all works.

items.title: Licensed and certified specialists
items.description: Work is guaranteed to be performed in accordance with all railway construction standards.

items.title: Modern equipment
items.description: We have a complete set of tools and equipment necessary for railway-related work. If needed, we rent large specialized railway machines and equipment (track laying cranes, motor draisines, etc.)

items.title: Railway and Infrastructure Maintenance
items.description: Our main task in providing maintenance services is systematic monitoring of railways and railway equipment to prevent failures, extend infrastructure element life, increase safety levels, and ensure smooth wagon delivery and removal.

items.title: Repair and Renovation
items.description: We provide comprehensive repair and renovation services for railway infrastructure, ensuring quality and durability.

items.title: Railway Construction
items.description: Complete railway construction services from planning to implementation, including new track laying and infrastructure development.

items.title: Design and Engineering
items.description: Professional design and engineering services for railway projects, including technical documentation and project planning.

cta.description: We invite you to become our client or partner!

railway_maintenance_page.title: Railway and Facilities Ongoing Maintenance
railway_maintenance_page.intro: In providing ongoing maintenance services, our main task is systematic supervision of railways and railway facilities to prevent malfunctions, extend the service life of railway infrastructure elements, and ensure safe vehicle traffic.

items.1: Regular visual inspections of tracks, sleepers, switches, subgrade, and other railway facilities and equipment
items.4: Technological maintenance and adjustment of railway equipment, including bolt tightening, joint bar installation, elimination of vertical steps in rail locks, welding seam grinding, rail spike re-nailing, trackside area mowing, lock gap adjustment, and switch cleaning and lubrication, etc.
items.5: Running repairs, during which individual elements of railway equipment are replaced

railway_maintenance_page.middle_text: Railway maintenance is carried out year-round. During maintenance, causes of malfunctions are investigated and necessary work is performed to eliminate them. This ensures the minimum required condition of the railway in accordance with current legislation, the Railway Act, and Railway Technical Operating Rules.

paragraphs.1: Section 39 of the Estonian Railway Act stipulates that all railway facility owners or operators must maintain railway facilities in good condition, depending on traffic load, but at least once during the specified period in accordance with Railway Technical Operating Rules.
paragraphs.2: If a company lacks qualified personnel for these tasks, it is recommended to use professional services.
paragraphs.3: Our team, together with our sister company, provides assistance in the maintenance of branch lines and tracks.
paragraphs.4: Check the condition of your branch line with us. We perform repairs and maintenance to ensure safe traffic.

repair_renovation_page.title: Repair and Renovation
repair_renovation_page.intro: We offer comprehensive railway repair and renovation services that ensure long-term durability and safety of railway infrastructure.

quality.title: Capital Repair and Renovation
quality.description: All repair and renovation works are carried out according to current standards and requirements. We use only certified materials and modern technologies.

capital_repair.intro: We offer complete capital repair and renovation services for railways. Our work includes:

items.1: Replacement of old rails and sleepers with new ones
items.3: Renovation of switches and earthworks when necessary
items.4: Complete railway repair with full documentation

bottom_sections.section1: During repair work, we take into account the age of the rail, the type of repair, and specific standards. All work is carried out in strict accordance with technical documentation and regulations for railways.
bottom_sections.section2: Our employees have acquired long and practical experience in the field of railway construction, so our clients can be assured that regardless of their field of activity, our managers have extensive experience with railways.
bottom_sections.section3: Upon completion of repair work, we can take over the maintenance of branch lines.
bottom_sections.section4: Contact our professionals for more information or request a license via email at info@rdt.ee

railway_infrastructure_page.title: Railway Infrastructure Construction
railway_infrastructure_page.intro: Railway construction is a rather complex and expensive undertaking. Therefore, it is very important to choose a reliable partner with a successful track record in the field of railway construction.

items.2: Preparation of financial calculations, reports, etc.
items.3: Preparation of technical conditions for railway construction
items.4: Construction of railway infrastructure according to specified conditions and projects

bottom_sections.section1: We ensure adherence to construction tasks, quality of work, and timely commissioning of the facility.
bottom_sections.section2: You can request additional construction information by writing to steelbuckle@steelbuckle.ee

railway_design_page.title: Design

items.1: Preparation and formalization of technical documentation for railway infrastructure changes (track closure, relocation, etc.)
items.2: Preparation of permit-related documentation and completion documentation for renovation and construction works

railway_design_page.bottom_section: Steel Buckle OÜ specialists take into account the client's wishes, the specifics of the company's operations, and regional characteristics. The result is optimal solutions to fulfill your objectives.

projects_page.page_subtitle: Creating the best solutions in collaboration with partners.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: We achieve the best results through a personalized approach and cooperation with our partners.
